mapper.update: update GATHERING set GA_NAME=#{ga_name}, TIME=#{time}, GA_PLACE=#{ga_place}, PRICE=#{price}, GA_LIMIT=#{ga_limit} where GA_SEQ=#{ga_seq}
mapper.select: select count(*) from MEM_IN_GATHERING where ga_seq=#{ga_seq}
select mname from member where mnum=(select mnum from GATHERING where ga_seq=#{ga_seq})
select mnum from MEM_IN_GATHERING where ga_seq=(select ga_seq from GATHERING where ga_seq=#{ga_seq}) and mnum=#{mnum}
mapper.delete: delete MEM_IN_GATHERING where mnum=#{mnum} and ga_seq=#{ga_seq}
mapper.select: select grade from MEM_IN_GATHERING where mnum=#{mnum} and ga_seq=#{ga_seq}
select mname, mnum, grade from member natural join MEM_IN_GATHERING where ga_seq =#{ga_seq} order by grade
select * from GATHERING where ga_seq=(select max(ga_seq) from GATHERING where mnum=#{mnum})
select * from (select ROWNUM rnum, aa.* from (select * from gathering order by ga_seq desc) aa where gseq=#{gseq}) where rnum between #{page} and #{page}+10
select count(*) from Gathering where gseq=#{gseq}
